alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Western Clay; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 2:35PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. Johns, northeastern Clay and south central Duval Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 235 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Oakleaf Plantation, or near Middleburg, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph, nickel size hail, and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Orange Park, Green Cove Springs, Mandarin, Middleburg, Fruit Cove, Fleming Island, Doctors Inlet, Lakeside, Oakleaf Plantation and Switzerland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Western Clay; Western Duval
